fullText: Owen brings a compelling mixture of arrogance and vulnerability to the role of Rene Gallimard, the French diplomat who falls in love with what he believes is a Chinese opera singer.
dtliExcerpt: Owen brings a compelling mixture of arrogance and vulnerability to the role of Rene Gallimard, the French diplomat who falls in love with what he believes is a Chinese opera singer.
